thread.title: BRIEF-Ligand Pharma Says Co Sent Computershare, As Rights Agent Under Glucagon CVR Agreement

title: BRIEF-Ligand Pharma Says Co Sent Computershare, As Rights Agent Under Glucagon CVR Agreement

organizations.name: brief-ligand pharma says co sent computershare
rights agent under glucagon cvr agreement reuters

text:
April 13, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Ligand Pharma Says Co Sent Computershare, As Rights Agent Under Glucagon CVR Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Ligand Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* LIGAND PHARMACEUTICALS SAYS HOLDERS OF GLUCAGON CVRS ENTITLED TO RECEIVE PRO RATA $3.8 MILLION Source text: ( bit.ly/2JHfcOF ) Further company coverage:
